misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence hailing from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his tenth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. With a steely gaze and an unyielding determination, Miso has become a well-known figure in this competition.

Miso's dedication to the sport is evident in every aspect of his game. Whispers around the clubhouse suggest a unique bond with his Miura irons, with some even claiming that he sleeps with them to maintain optimal performance. Whether these rumours are true or not, Miso's commitment is undeniable.

With one Hector Trophée victory already under his belt, Miso arrives at each event with an air of confidence that only a champion can possess. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his pursuit of individual excellence remains a driving force.

Miso's participation in the Hector Trophée is always marked by his strategic prowess and his ability to perform under pressure. He is a calculating player, and his opponents have to be wary of his every move. The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 promises to be another chapter in Miso's already impressive career.
